page.title: 19Place of Interest
page.content:
(cont) traditional Scots game of curling. Ice skating also takes place when the ice is suitable. In the early 1970's water ski-ing was started on the Loch and soon became the centre for water ski-ing, in Fife. A local man John Adam, was Scottish water ski jump champion several times in the 70's. Recently problems of pollution and weeds have curtailed the use of the loch for water ski-ing.
Within the last two years wind-surfing has become a popular pastime. Fishing on the Loch, although a favourite pastime is suffering from the effects of pollution of old mine workings.
